Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory67.jpg'}
{3: 'Record ID: HX-GA-49447-Kowloon End. Confirm recovery?'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Recovery confirmed. Verify keywords "Kowloong"" and ""War"?'}
{3: 'Confirmed.'}
{3: 'No response received from Huaxu within the predetermined response time.'}
{3: 'This does not comply with standard procedures.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Ignore procedure warning and execute.'}
{3: 'Understood.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory246.png'}
{3: 'Rolling billows of smoke are the first to appear. Flames pierce the pale sky, and a subtle burning smell fills the ruins.'}
{3: '—People know better than to guess at what is emitting the foul odor.'}
{3: 'Fires burn intermittently throughout the ruins, followed by the sounds of two heavy objects crashing onto the ground.'}
{3: 'The firelight and the sounds of falling cut through the long confrontation, but they do nothing to restore this war-torn city to normal.'}
{3: 'Among the ruins, a figure is walking through the fires of war.'}
{3: 'She climbs over a destroyed wall, through a fallen cement pipe, and turns over an inconspicuous slab of cement.'}
{3: '—Only to see four gun barrels pointed at her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: "Don't shoot! I'm one of you!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Realizing that the visitor isn't the enemy, the muzzles of the gun quickly move away from the hole, and the Pulao Crew member immediately jumps in."}
{3: 'Landing into a roll, the Pulao Crew member stops in front of a figure, half-kneeling.'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Pu 3953 reporting!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Report! Nodes Alpha 4 to Alpha 41 and Omega 6 to Omega 9 confirmed to be lost!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'The commander of the East Wall Defense Line suggests that you fall back three blocks, and then blast the buildings to fall back!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'What about the commander?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'The commander only had me tell you: "Thank you for not killing me eight years ago."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "...So he's trying to die on the battlefield after all.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Go. Retreat three blocks and relay the news for me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "...That'll give them some time to prepare.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Roger!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Pulao crew member quickly turns and nimbly jumps out of the hole.'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "Lady Qu, shouldn't we also start making preparations to retreat?"}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'Lady Qu?'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Take whatever supplies you can and retreat first.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'The defense line extends from the Alpha Line to the Iota Lina. Some nodes must have held their positions.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'They need someone to hold the frontline to give them time to retreat.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'But!'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'No buts. We all have Kowloong blood flowing in us.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'R-roger!'}
{3: 'Following this, Qu jumps out of the bunker and rushes into the infernal battlefield.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory246.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao Crew', 3: 'Alpha 3 and Iota 6 have lost communication with the Iota 8 barricade!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chiwen Crew', 3: 'Corrupted! The Corrupted are here! We still need time to withdraw the standard industrial blueprints! Can anyone from a nearby garrison offer support?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Crowd', 3: 'Ah—! No! Stay away!'}
{3: 'The once prosperous Kowloong City has become a hellhole. Here, Qu could not help but tighten her grip on her weapon.'}
{3: 'Qu shakes her head, perhaps at the unbearable sight of such tragedy. She takes a deep breath, putting her mind at ease momentarily.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'm the KCC leader—Qu.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'This battle—is my responsibility.', 4: '1'}
